author: Paul Maxim
content: After getting my EM1 last week I'm still going a little crazy trying to be sure my basic setup is the way I want it.  Fortunately, the EM1 acts a lot like the EM5.  Just a few more buttons on it!  Still, as I completely transition from a Canon DSLR I find that I'm a little nostalgic for the simplicity of Canon's menus.  Or maybe they just seem simple because I've used them for so long.  Anyway, too late to turn back now......
